mapper.insert: insert into bmuser ( account, password, name, gender, mobile, email, userGroupId, ctime, utime, isValid, status ) values ( #{account}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{userGroupId}, #{ctime}, #{utime}, #{isValid}, #{status} )
mapper.select: select * from bmuser where account = #{account} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update bmuser set account = #{account}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, mobile = #{mobile}, email = #{email}, userGroupId = #{userGroupId}, ctime = #{ctime}, utime = #{utime}, isValid = #{isValid}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
